title: 96 - Special Q & A Session after Public Session  (28-May-2023) | Engineer Muhammad Ali Mirza

timestamps.text: Namaz k Baad dua Biddat hai ??
Namaz mei Apni Zubaan (local/mother tongue) mei Dua karna ??
Research karnay k liye konsa topic parhei ??
Surah Aal-e-Imran mei Ghazwa-e-Uhad ki Shikasat aur Sood k sath jorna ??
Hazrat Uthman k bughz walay ka janaza ni parhana ??
Khutbah kharay ho kar ya beth kar ?? Jummay mei Taqreer aur Khutbah mei Farq ?? Hanfio ki Biddaat ??
Junaid Baghdadi aur Pani pe Chalna ?? Allah kyun ni Doobnay say Bachata ??
Jummay ka koi Masnoon Khutbah hai ?
Surah Baqarah ayat 62 Allah par Imaan Lanay pe Akhirat mei Koi Khauf Ni hoga ?? Non Muslims bhi Jannat mei ??
